name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Last year, Wu Yongqiang, a police officer of the Shaanxi Public Security Department, reported in his real name that Wang Xingning, secretary of the Shaanxi Discipline Inspection Commission, had acted as a protective umbrella for evil forces.
Recently, Wu Yongqiang's wife said that her husband went to Beijing on February 16 to defend his rights and accuse corrupt officials, and was criminally detained by Weinan police on suspicion of "picking quarrels and provoking trouble." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkpS3AsbkAATw6s.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Ukrainian Verkhovna Rada (session) passed the "No Elections Can Be Held During Wartime" resolution with 268 votes on Tuesday, emphasizing that Zelensky was legally elected president through elections, and that the Ukrainian people and the Supreme Council have never questioned his legitimacy. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkpX8rlX0AAQJ9A.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 23, Guangyuan, Sichuan. It was revealed online that Guangyuan Zhongfu High-Precision Aluminum Co., Ltd. forced employees to participate in the stock market. Ordinary employees must hold at least 10,000 shares (30,000 yuan), and team leaders and above must hold at least 30,000 shares. Those who fail to participate in the stock market as required will be dismissed. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkpZWz9XEAAI-cM.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a man in South Korea imitated Chun Doo-hwan, who suppressed citizens during the 5.18 Gwangju Democratization Movement, sparking controversy. The man wore a jacket and military boots, cosplaying as Chun Doo-hwan, waving a red stick in front of the National Gwangju Museum. The video was captioned: "Gwangju, I, Chun Doo-hwan, am back in the heavy snow!" Park Kang-bae, executive director of the 5.18 Memorial Foundation, said: "This is tearing up the painful history of our country. If you respect the history and citizens of other countries, you will never do this." He also said: "Isn't this like people from our country going to China and holding a photo of President Xi Jinping to talk about the Tiananmen Incident? Please don't make fun of our pain." Earlier, in the football match between South Korea's Gwangju FC and China's Taishan, Chinese fans were photographed holding photos of Chun Doo-hwan and Kim Jong-un, which was criticized by the public.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the incident attracted public attention, the Beijing Sports Bureau revised the 2025 fiscal budget report and deleted the names of Gu Ailing and Zhu Yi from the column of "Funds for Training and Competition of Outstanding Athletes". https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkplKYtXsAAbm9a.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 23, a blogger said that new energy vehicle companies are now keen on making up words, such as "Kirin Battery, Lingxi Communication, Qiankun Intelligent Driving, Kunpeng Computing Power..." The blogger believes that many new energy vehicle companies are now collectively suffering from the second disease in marketing, which just exposes their lack of confidence in their own technology research and development, so they use coined words to fill the anxiety of technological breakthroughs, but consumers do not want these words, but sincerity. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894466258143514626/pu/img/ODUguHtAnkXK0VjG.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens contributed: Current situation of junior high school students in Yangzhou https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkrnEugWgAE2Xt3.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Feedback from students around the world https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gkr0Dr1WgAACHiD.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 25 (released), Shijiazhuang, Hebei. The online car-hailing driver reminded the traffic police to wear a helmet. The traffic police then checked the driver's driver's license and vehicle registration, and seemed to be looking for trouble with the driver. After carefully confirming that there was no problem, the traffic police let the driver go. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894615848662224896/pu/img/j8gt6Y_9ylfQlX2_.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 26, Chen Shifei, former deputy director of the National Medical Products Administration, was dismissed. He once said that every new coronavirus vaccine is qualified and safe. 
February 25, Guangdong. A woman said that after receiving the third dose of Wuhan Biological's new coronavirus vaccine, she was diagnosed with CIDP, which made her unable to take care of herself and her muscles were twitching all day long. She hoped that the Shenzhen Health Commission could solve the treatment costs. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gks3SA2aUAA_kHU.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Dong Yuyu, a well-known Chinese journalist, was arrested while having lunch with Japanese diplomats in Beijing in February 2022. He was charged with espionage and sentenced to seven years in prison. His son Dong Yifu said at the National Press Club in Washington, D.C. on February 24 that his father was ready to appeal. He also urged the Japanese authorities to help prove that his father's meeting with Japanese diplomats had nothing to do with espionage. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gks8yC8bEAEH-EZ.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
US President Trump is reportedly developing stricter chip control measures for China. Bloomberg reported that Trump administration officials recently met with Japanese and Dutch officials to discuss restricting Tokyo Electron and ASML from providing maintenance services for Chinese semiconductor equipment.
The Trump administration also plans to restrict the number and types of chips Nvidia exports to China, and some officials also hope to increase restrictions on SMIC.
Washington's goal is to prevent China from further developing its domestic semiconductor industry because semiconductor technology can enhance China's artificial intelligence and military capabilities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 26 (Release) Renqiu, Hebei. An old man begs outdoors. He said that in 2009, he was beaten and disabled by a group of people for stopping evil people from driving a car and hitting people. One of the attackers was a policeman. They did not allow him to report his heroic act and threatened the reporters who reported it.
The old man has been petitioning for many years, but the public security, procuratorate and courts are in collusion and sentenced the old man to one year in prison for the crime of provoking disturbances https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GktHLcIXQAAOxuo.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the 26th, the Ministry of National Defense of Taiwan: Since 8:42 am, a total of 32 sorties of PLA J-11, KJ-500 and other main and auxiliary fighters and drones have been detected going out to sea, of which 22 sorties crossed the median line and its extension line and entered the airspace of northern and southwest Taiwan, and claimed that they would conduct "shooting training". The Ministry of National Defense of Taiwan expressed severe condemnation for this.
Wang Huning said on Wednesday that it is necessary to resolutely crack down on the provocative acts of "Taiwan independence" and shape the inevitable unification trend of the motherland. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GktKa-LaIAA10AP.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Nikkei used the term "Cultural Revolution" in an article commenting on a series of cuts implemented by the Trump administration.
The article said: Musk's purge of the government has already involved defense and diplomacy. Trump is using young people like Musk, just like Mao Zedong's Red Guards, to purge those staff members who do not show enough loyalty. Experts believe that this is very similar to the Cultural Revolution launched by Mao Zedong in China https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GktOS32XwAAh5LR.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 24, the Central Finance Office said: The countryside is a field full of hope, so young people in the new era have great potential in the countryside.
Netizens said: Why does this sound so familiar? Are we going to encourage people to go to the countryside again?
Others said: Where are your children developing? Can you take the lead in going to the countryside? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894699905224249344/pu/img/9F3IWwg6glh79Vgl.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Linfen, Shanxi, a woman said that her child lost contact in Vietnam last year. During this period, she contacted the Vietnamese and Thai embassies and submitted relevant information, but there has been no news so far. The woman knelt down and asked for help from netizens. 
At present, the video posted by the woman has been deleted by the platform. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894702069983977472/pu/img/UCkpu_iEzJFpO7Wq.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xu Yaohua, the Chinese president of Donghu Company, which runs a Chinese restaurant in Tokyo, and the company's former accountant were arrested again on suspicion of defrauding Japan's new crown subsidies. Xu Yaohua was a third-class secretary of the Chinese Embassy in Japan in his early years. After investigation, it was found that during the epidemic, the two instructed three employees to apply for business closure subsidies from the Tokyo Labor Bureau, defrauding a total of 16 million yen, but the store was never actually closed.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GktdZ7ibUAAiZEo.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Quan Hengdao, a 61-year-old Chinese man, was previously a researcher at Japan's "National Institute of Advanced Industrial Science and Technology". The indictment accuses him of emailing the institute's fluorine compound research data to a Chinese chemical product manufacturing company in 2018.
Japanese police found through investigation that Quan Hengdao may have participated in the "Thousand Talents Plan" led by the Chinese government (recruiting researchers working in foreign scientific research institutions to serve China). In the end, he was sentenced to four years of probation and fined 2 million yen. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gkthi6SbYAAobMW.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 24, Changsha, Hunan. An elderly man complained that he went to a pharmacy to buy special outpatient medicines, but was told that he needed a prescription to buy them. He went to a community hospital to get a prescription but it still didn't work, so he went to a street hospital to get a prescription. The street hospital was crowded with patients who came to get prescriptions, and he finally bought the medicine in the evening. The elderly man said that now the Medical Insurance Bureau has set up obstacles everywhere, adding burdens to the people, and those officials are sitting in their offices and thinking about it. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GktlJRVWIAAi4ec.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 26, Qiushi.com: Chinese-style modernization: guiding the correct direction of human civilization progress, Chinese-style modernization cares about the fate of mankind with broad feelings. Chinese-style modernization is not only the result of the progress of human civilization, but also reflects the sublimation of human civilization. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GktqzbSbEAAU7kw.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hong Kong's fiscal deficit for 2024-25 is expected to be HK$87.2 billion. In order to reduce the huge fiscal deficit, the Hong Kong government announced a salary freeze for all civil servants and cut 10,000 positions during the current Hong Kong government term. In addition, the Hong Kong government also plans to cut funding for public universities by 2% in the next three years. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GktuE30aoAAz1Uw.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Jiangyan District, Taizhou, Jiangsu Province announced population data: 2,200 births and 8,000 deaths in Jiangyan District in 2024. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GktwRuBaEAAyG7q.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Li Wei'ao, chief reporter of Economic Observer: "I have a question. In many large hospitals in Beijing, there are a huge number of "contract workers" - both doctors and nurses. At the same time, the Beijing Hospital Management Center still has more than 10,000 idle positions. Why not give these idle positions to doctors and nurses?" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gkt0tRMWsAAg0mu.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The deceased's daughter, Ms. Chen, told her story https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gkt7E20aUAAQB1t.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 26, a netizen posted a poster of the CCP's propaganda against Taiwan, which triggered ridicule from netizens. Many netizens complained about China in the comment section: "My mother (China) makes me live like a dog" "My mother made me penniless" "My mother tried every means to plot against me" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkuA2KgXIAAOIZp.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, Japanese media reported that a 25-year-old Chinese man named Cai Chengxing, who works in the IT industry in Japan, approached a high school girl on the street in Tokyo's Nerima district last month and asked her, "Can I hug and kiss her?" The high school girl refused and left, but Cai Chengxing continued to pester her, following her all the way, and finally forced her to hug and kiss her. After being arrested, Cai Chengxing confessed to the indecent behavior. Some Chinese netizens praised him for "bringing glory to the country" while others accused him of "shame on her."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On Wednesday, Russia walked out of a speech at the UN Human Rights Council. Among them were the ambassadors of France, Germany and Britain. This was to express support for Ukraine.
Simon Manley, the British ambassador to the United Nations and the WTO, told Reuters: "Our support for Ukraine is unwavering. We want to see a just and lasting peace in accordance with the UN Charter and international law." https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkuK6_pagAAtdYv.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Suzhou, Jiangsu, an agent said at the Suzhou Industrial Park Housing Management Bureau: "The park's real estate transaction hall is full on weekdays. They must have hired people at their expense, 200 yuan a day." As a result, he was criminally detained by the local police in accordance with the law. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkuO1b0aUAAhkF4.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 26, Langfang, Hebei. A ragged old man was looking for food in a trash can. A kind passerby gave him 100 yuan, but he refused to take it.
February 23, Yunnan. Students in a local primary school were eating snow-white porridge, and there were no vegetables.
February 24, Hebei. At around 21:25 in the evening, a student with white hair was still on his way home in the subway car. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894774433124077568/pu/img/LnLGnHiPvQHUX1TR.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 24, Xiaogan, Hubei. Candy Coast Weicai Kindergarten, the instructor asked the children: "In the past, a country came to steal our things. Which country was it?" The children answered: "Japan" The instructor asked again: "Should we drive them out?" The children answered: "Yes"
Netizens in the comment area sympathized with the children in the video: "So pitiful, let the children play without worries" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1894776915967565824/pu/img/sdD5vPGVh2VqqBOP.jpg
